title: Demographics and Baseline Characteristics (DMT01)
section: Building an DMT01 table using the {cards} package
text:
Building an DMT01 table using the {cards} package
In this example below we create the same demographics table using the {gtsummary} package, with the same data set provided by the {chevron} package.


Show the code
library(gtsummary)

tbl <-
  syn_data$adsl|>
  gtsummary::tbl_summary(
  by = ARM,
  statistic = list(
    all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
    all_categorical() ~ "{n} / {N} ({p}%)"
  ),
  missing = "no",
  include = c("AGE", "AGEGR1", "ARM", "SEX", "ETHNIC", "RACE")
)

ard <- tbl |> gather_ard()

ard$tbl_summary

title: QCing with {cards} and {cardx}
text:
QCing with {cards} and {cardx}
This catalog is meant to demo the use of ARD-centric packages within the Quality Control workflow. Verification of statistics generated with NEST packages (such as: {tern}, {rtables}, {chevron}) can be verified by reproducing the tables using Analysis Results Dataset (ARDs).
